name: Mondstadt
description:
Freedom is the first principle of cards.
Freely you organize your deck, freely you choose your opponents, and freely you play your hand.
...Or perhaps you might use that freedom to not play at all, and do something else with the cards you have in hand.
descriptionraw: Freedom is the first principle of cards.\nFreely you organize your deck, freely you choose your opponents, and freely you play your hand.\n...Or perhaps you might use that freedom to not play at all, and do something else with the cards you have in hand.
